entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Nain
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming northeast 20 near midnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning and early in the afternoon. Clearing late in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Sunday 01 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Sunday 01 January 2023
